name: Deadly Base
description:
DEADLY BASE

A base defense game where you CAN BUILD WALLS AND DOORS and you CAN DESTROY WALL AND DOORS and you EAT... yeah you CAN EAT A LOT OF CANNED FOOD. Be careful ! Because the zombies CAN KILL YOU but YOU CAN KILL THE ZOMBIES!!! Sounds good huh ? Download it and try it !

Move forward:W

Build wall:F

Build door "vertical":G

Build door "horizontal":H

Eat: put the cursor on the food and press E

Pick up food: just run into it

Throw food : R

Delete door or wall: right click

Shoot: left click

Go to the menu : ESC
